comments:
I20070103 HEAD with Amateras HTML Editor (tk.eclipse.plugin.htmleditor.editors.HTMLSourceEditor).
The bug is probably in the Amateras plugin as they implement IEditorSite themselves. But the editor code should better test 'listener' for null.

Fixed in HEAD.
Available in builds > N20070103-0010.
